00036 struct trans_tab_struct
00037 {
00039         double  relFreqF,
00041                 relFreqE;

00054 Hypothesis* pruneStack(stack < Hypothesis* > &s)
00055 {
00056         vector<Hypothesis*> v;
00057         unsigned int size = s.size();
00058         v.resize(size);
00059 
00060         for (unsigned int i=0; !s.empty(); i++)
00061         {
00062                 v[i] = s.top();
00063                 s.pop();
00064         }
00065         sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmp_Hyp);
00066 
00067         for (unsigned int i=0; i<size && i<KEEP_N_BEST_HYPOS ;i++)
00068         {
00069                 s.push(v[i]);
00070         }
00071         //return best Hypo
00072         return v[0];
00073 }

00082 Hypothesis* searchTranslation(vector<unsigned int> &words, vector<trans_tab_struct>  &translationtab)
00083 {
00084         Hypothesis* minCostsHyp;
00085         vector< stack < Hypothesis* > > stacks;
00086         stacks.resize((words.size()+1));
00087         Hypothesis* h = new Hypothesis(NULL,0,0,0);
00088         stacks[0].push(h);
00089 
00090         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++)
00091         {
00092 
00093                 unsigned int j = 0;
00094                 // find first occurance of word[i] in transtab
00095                 while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] != (translationtab[j].f))
00096                 {
00097                         j++;
00098                 }
00099                 unsigned int first_occ = j;
00100 
00101                 while (!stacks[i].empty())
00102                 {
00103                         Hypothesis *prev = stacks[i].top();
00104 
00105                         // make hyps for all the possible translations
00106                         j = first_occ;
00107                         bool found_at_least_one_hypo = false;
00108                         while (j < translationtab.size() && words[i] == (translationtab[j].f))
00109                         {
00110                                 found_at_least_one_hypo = true;
00111                                 Hypothesis *h = new Hypothesis(prev, translationtab[j].relFreqF, translationtab[j].relFreqE, translationtab[j].e);
00112                                 stacks[i+1].push(h);
00113                                 j++;
00114                         }
00115                         if (!found_at_least_one_hypo)
00116                         {
00117                                 // insert '(?)'
00118                                 stacks[i+1].push(new Hypothesis(prev,0, 0, 0));
00119                         }
00120                         stacks[i].pop();
00121                 }
00122                 minCostsHyp = pruneStack(stacks[i+1]);
00123 
00124         }
00125         // return best Hypothesis of the last stack
00126         return minCostsHyp;
00127 }

00129 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00130 {
00131 
00132         if (argc < 3)
00133         {
00134                 cerr << "ERROR: not enough parameters" << endl << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " translation-table source-document" << endl;
00135                 return 0; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00136         }
00137 
00138         // open files
00139         ifstream trans_tab(argv[1]);
00140         ifstream src_doc(argv[2]);
00141         if (!trans_tab.good())
00142         {
00143                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening translation table ("<< argv[1] <<") failed." << endl;
00144                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00145         }
00146         if (!src_doc.good())
00147         {
00148                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening source document ("<< argv[2] <<") failed." << endl;
00149                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00150         }
00151 
00152         unsigned int i = 0;
00153         vector<struct trans_tab_struct> trans_tab_vec;
00154         trans_tab_vec.resize(VECTOR_INIT_SIZE);
00155         string line;
00156 
00157         // read trans_tab into trans_tab_vec
00158         while (getline(trans_tab, line))
00159         {
00160                 struct trans_tab_struct current;
00161                 double temp;
00162                 // line is formatted like: <double> <double> # <string> # <string>
00163 
00164                 vector<string> line_vec = stringSplit(line, " ");
00165 
00166                 istringstream isstrF(line_vec[0]);
00167                 isstrF >> temp;
00168                 current.relFreqF = temp;
00169 
00170                 istringstream isstrE(line_vec[1]);
00171                 isstrE >> temp;
00172                 current.relFreqE = temp;
00173 
00174                 current.f = f.insertWord(line_vec[3]);
00175 
00176                 current.e = e.insertWord(line_vec[5]);
00177 
00178                 if (i >= trans_tab_vec.size())
00179                 {
00180                         trans_tab_vec.resize(trans_tab_vec.size() + VECTOR_RESIZE);
00181                 }
00182                 trans_tab_vec[i] = current;
00183                 // cout << f.getWord(current.f) << " " << current.relFreqF << endl;
00184                 i++;
00185         }
00186         trans_tab_vec.resize(i);
00187 
00188         // translate src_doc
00189         while (getline(src_doc, line))
00190         {
00191                 vector<string> stringwords = stringSplit(line, " ");
00192                 vector<unsigned int> words(stringwords.size(), 0);
00193 
00194                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < stringwords.size(); i++)
00195                 {
00196                         words[i] = f.getNum(stringwords[i]);
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 Hypothesis* transHyp = searchTranslation(words, trans_tab_vec);
00200 
00201                 string translation = "";
00202                 while (transHyp->prevHyp != NULL)
00203                 {
00204                         translation = e.getWord(transHyp->trans) + " " + translation;
00205                         transHyp = transHyp->prevHyp;
00206                 }
00207                 cout << translation << endl;
00208         }
00209 
00210         return 0; //EXIT_SUCCESS;
00211 }
